block.p: Catherine Eydie Cole and Dr. Henry Heesang Woo were married yesterday at the Roman Catholic Church of St. Thomas More in Darien, Conn. The Rev. Dr. Robert J. Post performed the ceremony.

Mrs. Woo, 30, is known as Eydie. She was until March the assistant manager of clinical nutrition at New York University Medical Center and is now an independent nutrition counselor. She graduated from Boston College. She and the bridegroom received graduate degrees from New York University, she a master's in nutrition and he an M.D.
Catherine Eydie Cole and Dr. Henry Heesang Woo were married yesterday at the Roman Catholic Church of St. Thomas More in Darien, Conn. The Rev. Dr. Robert J. Post performed the ceremony.

Mrs. Woo, 30, is known as Eydie. She was until March the assistant manager of clinical nutrition at New York University Medical Center and is now an independent nutrition counselor. She graduated from Boston College. She and the bridegroom received graduate degrees from New York University, she a master's in nutrition and he an M.D.
The bride is the daughter of the late Catherine Cole and the late Dr. Raymond Cole, who was the chairman of otolaryngology at Greenwich (Conn.) Hospital.

Dr. Woo, 31, is a chief resident in neurosurgery at the New York University Medical Center. He graduated from Williams College. He is a son of Dr. Robert Woo and Melanie Woo of Hudson, N.Y. His father is an anesthesiologist in New York.
